name: Max Raabe and his Palast Orchester: Hummeln streicheln (Stroking the Bumblebees)
description: Max Raabe returns to the historic Admiralspalast with his signature blend of 1920s dance orchestra sound, modern lyrics, and theatrical camp. The group has been filling Berlin's concert halls since the 1980s, bringing Weimar-era nostalgia into conversation with contemporary wordplay and performance.
